response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value and the impact it can have on your business, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,250,000. This represents a substantial discount compared to the market value of $1,500,000, making it an exceptional opportunity for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any additional information to make your decision.", "product_price": 1250000}
